title: Delhi Crime (TV Series 2019- ) - IMDb
body: Delhi Crime: Created by Richie Mehta. With Shefali Shah, Rasika Dugal, Rajesh Tailang, Anurag Arora. Based on the Nirbhaya case, Delhi Crime follows the Delhi Police investigation into the finding of the men who perpetrated this crime.

title: Delhi sees rise in murder and rape cases, dip in street crimes this ...
body: Delhi has seen a rise in heinous crimes like murder, rape and dacoity, and an alarming increase in theft by interstate gangs targeting cars, mobile phones and vehicles in the city, over the last six months, Delhi Police data show. Despite multiple incidents of snatching and armed robbery recently, street crime, according to the police, has decreased in the city - with half the snatching cases registered yet to be solved even as less than a fourth of theft cases have been worked out.

title: Crimes in Delhi up by over 8%: Delhi Police data
body: Cases of crime reported in Delhi till July 15 this year increased by 8.1%, compared to the same period last year, according to statistics shared by the Delhi Police on Wednesday, showing a broad ...

title: Delhi Crime Latest - NDTV.com
body: Aamir is a career criminal with a Rs 25,000 reward on his head, police said. He has allegedly been involved in around 100 crimes in Delhi NCR, mostly breaking into big showrooms and looting.

title: Sensational killings, street crime kept Delhi on edge in 2021
body: Rajinder Singh, former Delhi Police officer, who played a vital role in cracking the 2016 gang rape case, said 2020 and 2021 were quite different years when comes to crime in the city.
